message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll love it. I'm willing to let it go for $10,000.
I appreciate the offer, Alice, but I'm looking to pay closer to $8,000 for this product.  Let's see if we can find a price that works for both of us.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I have to make a living too! I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $9,500.
I appreciate the compromise, Alice, but $9,500 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to go up to $9,000. Let's see if we can finalize a deal.

I'm getting a bit frustrated, to be honest. I was really hoping to get closer to the value you put on the product, which is $12,000. I'm willing to meet you at $9,500, but I need a bit more. Let's try $9,750.
